Build ID: I20070323-1616

This was found using the test plugin from:
https://dev.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=160564
to run repeated connection attempts to the agent
controller.

Both problems described in this log appear to be fixed in
4.4 except in one case:

When I am running an workbench on windows XP and remotely
connection to an agent controller on linux (paradox-rh21as)
I frequently get a connection exception at around 45 attempts. The exception is:

org.eclipse.hyades.execution.core.DaemonConnectException								
	at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.local.NodeImpl._connect(NodeImpl.java:225)							
	at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.local.NodeImpl.connect(NodeImpl.java:360)							
	at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.local.NodeImpl.connect(NodeImpl.java:347)							
	at zsessionfailuretest.actions.SampleAction$1.run(SampleAction.java:116)							
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)							
Caused by: org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.local.control.InactiveProcessException								
	at org.eclipse.hyades.internal.execution.local.control.ProcessImpl.getProcessId(ProcessImpl.java:497)							
	at org.eclipse.hyades.execution.local.NodeImpl._connect(NodeImpl.java:220)							
	... 4 more
Failed to connect 19	

and is repeated for each connection attempt from the
time it first occurs until all attempts are made.
After the failure the ac needs to be restarted before
the test can be attempted again.




More information:

Steps to reproduce:
1. download the *first* test plugin in the log 160564
and install to eclipse plugins, restart eclipse.
2. A menu item ACDiag should be present, choose the
Session Connect item from this and give the prompts the
remote linux host and at least 50 iterations with the default 0 ms gap (see the other bug or included source
for more details about this driver)
3. If no error by completion repeat the execution

Hi Samson,
I've investigated the defect and it seems that the descibed use case is inconsistent.
After each test iteration a separate jvm is launched (with HyadesTestingSession class) and isn't being deactivated.
So, after 50 test iteration 50 jvm are launched and active and framework stops to work due to resource constraints.

To perform connection testing the use case should be improved.

It seems this bug could be closed as "INVALID"

Hi Alan. Is it possible to fix the test case so that the idle jvms are freed up to prevent running out of system resources?

In the meantime I agree with Igor that the use case requires some rework but I will leave this open and target it to the furure.
